trans-unit.source: Represents the set of arguments that a configured <xref href="System.Activities.CodeActivity"></xref> introduces to the execution environment.
trans-unit.target: 代表引數集合，設定<xref href="System.Activities.CodeActivity"></xref>導入至執行環境。

trans-unit.source: Adds an argument to the collection of arguments of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 將引數加入至活動引數的集合。

trans-unit.source: The argument to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的引數。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的驗證錯誤加入至中繼資料的驗證錯誤集合。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][命令式程式碼式驗證](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The validation error to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Adds a validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors using the specified description.
trans-unit.target: 將驗證錯誤加入至中繼資料的驗證錯誤的集合使用指定的描述。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][命令式程式碼式驗證](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the validation error.
trans-unit.target: 描述驗證錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結指定<xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref> to bind.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"> </xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> to bind.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity’s <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref> of arguments or symbols introduced by a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得活動的<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref>的引數或符號所導入<xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s location reference environment of arguments or symbols introduced by a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 活動的位置參考環境的引數或符號所導入<xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to this metadata instance.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於這個中繼資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to this metadata instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件等於此中繼資料執行個體。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of arguments obtained by using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回使用反映取得的引數的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an activity’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to examine all public properties of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument> and returns them in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用活動的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>檢查類型的所有公用屬性<xref:System.Activities.Argument>並將它們傳回集合中。</xref:System.Activities.Argument> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A collection of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 引數的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique identifier for this metadata instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個中繼資料執行個體的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An integer that uniquely identifies this metadata instance.
trans-unit.target: 整數，可唯一識別這個中繼資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there are any validation errors in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出中繼資料中是否有任何驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation errors are present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證沒有錯誤。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the two specified metadata instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出兩個指定的中繼資料執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The second item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two items are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個項目是否相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the two specified metadata instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出兩個指定的中繼資料執行個體是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The first item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two items are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個項目是否不相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the activity requires an extension of the specified type at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 指定活動需要在執行階段所指定型別的擴充。

trans-unit.source: If the host fails to provide an extension of the specified type, validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機無法提供指定型別的擴充，則驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: The type of the extension.
trans-unit.target: 延伸的型別。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of arguments to the activity’s arguments.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之集合的引數加入至活動的引數。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入引數。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of validation errors to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的驗證錯誤集合加入至中繼資料的驗證錯誤集合。

trans-unit.source: The validation errors to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的驗證錯誤。
